mapper.select: SELECT B.article_no, B.board_no, B.article_writer, B.article_userid, B.article_title, B.article_content, B.article_secretyn, B.article_password, B.article_parentsno, B.article_grouporder, B.article_groupdepth, B.article_hit, DATE_FORMAT(article_date, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS article_date, B.article_deleteyn, B.article_noticeyn, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM replytbl A WHERE A.article_no = B.article_no) as reply_cnt FROM multiboardtbl A, articletbl B WHERE A.board_no = B.board_no AND A.board_no = #{board_no} ORDER BY article_parentsno DESC, article_grouporder ASC, article_date DESC

SELECT B.article_no, B.board_no, B.article_writer, B.article_userid, B.article_title, B.article_content, B.article_secretyn, B.article_password, B.article_parentsno, B.article_grouporder, B.article_groupdepth, B.article_hit, DATE_FORMAT(article_date, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS article_date, B.article_deleteyn, B.article_noticeyn, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM replytbl A WHERE A.article_no = B.article_no) as reply_cnt FROM multiboardtbl A, articletbl B WHERE A.board_no = B.board_no AND A.board_no = #{board_no} ORDER BY article_parentsno DESC, article_grouporder ASC, article_date DESC LIMIT #{pageCon}, #{pageList}

SELECT COUNT(*) AS cnt FROM multiboardtbl A, articletbl B
WHERE A.board_no = B.board_no AND B.article_title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') AND B.article_deleteyn = 'N' AND A.board_no = #{board_no} ORDER BY B.article_date DESC
WHERE A.board_no = B.board_no AND B.article_content LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') AND B.article_deleteyn = 'N' AND A.board_no = #{board_no} ORDER BY B.article_date DESC
WHERE A.board_no = B.board_no AND B.article_writer LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') AND B.article_deleteyn = 'N' AND A.board_no = #{board_no} ORDER BY B.article_date DESC
WHERE A.board_no = B.board_no AND B.article_title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR B.article_content LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR B.article_writer LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') AND A.board_no = #{board_no} AND B.article_deleteyn = 'N'

SELECT article_no, board_no, article_writer, article_userid, article_title, article_content, article_secretyn, article_password, article_parentsno, article_grouporder, article_groupdepth, article_hit, DATE_FORMAT(article_date, '%Y-%m-%d %h:%i:%s') AS article_date, article_deleteyn, article_noticeyn FROM ARTICLETBL WHERE article_no = #{article_no}

UPDATE ARTICLETBL SET article_deleteyn = 'Y' WHERE article_no = #{article_no}
